比武招親【英豪の亂舞】至尊版  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Dragon+Game+Studio" title="Dragon Game Studio">Dragon Game Studio</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="hero.defense.zombie"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHQobEhkKE2hlcm8uZGVmZW5zZS56b21iaWUQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  新版本神秘經驗江湖－風水寶地限定開啟，絕強俠客重出江湖，新版boss腥風血雨等你來戰！<p>★萬千女性玩家真實在線成親，搶親，唯美畫面，絕美卡牌★<br>★上傳照片，社區交友，喝酒比武，真人po圖現身facebook粉絲頁，線下勁爆互動★<br>★首款完美融合【時尚Q版】【武俠題材】【真實交友】【卡牌對戰】於一體的手遊巨作★<br>★武俠世界《比武招親》將讓你的2014刻骨銘心！★</p><p><br>facebook粉絲頁：https://www.facebook.com/zmbwtw&nbsp;<br>客戶郵箱：cs4tw@elex.com&nbsp;</p><p>--遊戲簡介-- <br>萬千女性玩家真實在線成親，搶親，真人po圖現身facebook粉絲頁，線下勁爆互動，證明《正妹保衛戰》是您本年度最值的擁有的手機網遊！《正妹保衛戰》是中國首款完美融合【時尚Q版】【武俠題材】【真實交友】【卡牌對戰】於一體的手遊巨作！ </p><p>頂級配樂，唯美畫面，絕美卡牌，上傳照片，社區交友，搶親闖關，喝酒比武，快意恩仇，俠侶親密，這是一個武俠世界，又不僅僅是武俠世界！相信每個人心中都有一個武俠夢，那《比武招親》將讓你的2014刻骨銘心！</p><p>【天罡七星陣，所向披靡】<br>新版增加七星陣功能，七個陣位經過合理的搭配能夠大大提升攻防值，戰前合理搭配，完全能夠左右戰局，立於不敗之地。</p><p>【新增曆練，闖王寶藏】<br>李自成闖王寶藏重出江湖，各路俠客蜂擁而起，闖王寶藏玩法中能夠獲得極為珍貴的寶箱和七星陣經驗提升符，擊敗精英怪和BOSS更有大量獎勵。</p><p><br>【徵婚宣言，文藝招親】<br>新版本增加“文招”功能，可在月老廟中發佈一則招親宣言，與玩家進行交流，在文招持續時間內，可以在回覆宣言的玩家里自行選擇自己喜歡的人，和他/她成為俠侶。</p><p>【俠侶許願，豐厚獎勵】<br>玩家成為俠侶後，會共同擁有一棵許願樹。在許願樹中，可以根據自己希望得到的獎勵刷新願望並許願給另一半，對方完成任務後許願的玩家就可以領取願望獎勵。在完成一定數量的任務後更可摘取果實獎勵，許願樹等級越高，摘取的果實獎勵就越好。</p><p><br>【跨服激戰】<br>“華山論劍“跨服激戰，震撼開啟！終於可以同其他服的大俠們一決高下了。擂鼓聲聲，萬人集結華山之巔，爭奪天下霸主，贏取豐厚獎勵！</p><p>【煥然一新，改名卡】<br>很多玩家在進入遊戲的時候都是隨便取了一個名稱，可是後面又角色名稱不好聽，或者想和俠侶換情侶名稱，現在出了改名卡，這一切都不在是夢幻了。 </p><p>【俠客經驗傳承】<br>新版本“俠客傳承”功能讓這個想法不再僅僅是幻想，你可以將任何4星到6星的俠客經驗、階數，即可瞬間讓俠客攻防能力飛速上升，再也不用苦苦修煉，即可輕鬆上陣，為戰鬥助力！ </p><p>【秘笈參悟】<br>“秘笈參悟”順時而出。乾坤大位移、葵花神功等這樣的蓋世神功，入門容易突破難，想要徹底參悟神功，總是一層難過一層。讓俠客功力更上一層樓，戰鬥更給力！ </p><p>【組隊塔召喚NPC】<br>組隊闖關最討厭什麼？二缺一！全新組隊塔召喚NPC功能為你一鍵解千愁，開啟“召喚分身”，不論好友是否線上，你都可以從好友上陣俠客列表中挑選最中意的戰鬥俠客，讓你一個人也能在組隊塔里玩到high。 </p><p>【愛語音聊天，玩轉漂流瓶】<br>無論有什麼煩惱，都可以裝在小小的漂流瓶裡。任你是耍酷、裝逼還是玩純情、搞文藝，或文字、或語音，扔個漂流瓶，讓你遇見緣分中的那個他/她。 </p><p>【江湖黑店，賺元寶】<br>來闖蕩江湖走趟黑店，低價買進，高價賣出，實在是賺錢良品、發財利器。<br> <br>【俠客經脈，修真元】 <br>要練神功，經脈先通去桃花島、縹緲峰上獲真元，打通俠客經脈，成就蓋世神功、武林至尊。 </p><p>【科舉答題，百曉生】 <br>十年寒窗無人問，一舉成名天下知。中考、高考，考出高低； 會試、殿試，試看無敵。江湖百曉生，知識大比拼。 </p><p>【LBS定位，追正妹】<br>即時定位，附近搜索。全新LBS定位，發現你身邊的男神女神。少年大膽向前沖，她逃不出你的手掌心。 </p><p>【俠侶愛慕，結婚吧】<br>我們自願結為夫妻，從今天開始，我們將共同肩負起婚姻賦予我們的責任和義務。同闖江湖，同奪秘笈，打造婚戒，互相親密，嚴防小三、小四挖牆腳。 </p><p>【鴛鴦戲水，來泡澡】 <br>泡澡是夫妻間最赤果果的親密接觸。相公快來，皮癢癢了，快來幫我搓搓背。 </p><p>【真實社交，成親搶親啦】 <br>比武,招親，不是夢。搶親挖角，擋不住。開放的江湖世界，誰說令狐沖只能愛任盈盈，東方叔叔怎麼辦？招親只是一個開始，結婚只是一個過程，還有小三小四小五無數的單身俠客正在揮舞著鋤頭，挖向你的牆角！ </p><p>【溫聲細語，溫柔展現】 <br>想聽女神甜美的聲音麼？想被萌音震撼麼？想被禦姐的溫柔之聲治癒麼？想要與眾不同的自我介紹麼？語音錄製簽名介紹，一起來尋找屬於你的他或她！ </p><p>【武俠世界，更精彩】 <br>這裡有俠義蓋世的蕭峰，也有邪魅不羈的東方不敗，身邊美人如群的韋小寶，更有神仙姐姐王語嫣，不食人間煙火的小龍女，聰慧靈動的蓉妹妹，攜手屬於你心中的最強搭檔，組建強大陣容，點亮你的武俠世界。</p><p>【定位女神座標，嗖】<br>想知道你附近的同伴有誰麼？想知道你的女神在你身邊麼？想知道你附近有多少女神麼？那麼你一定不能錯過搜索定位系統，抓住自己的女神，抓住自己的幸福吧！</p><p>【青龍白虎，鎮幫威】<br>傳說中的神物：青龍白虎朱雀玄武重現江湖，強大的能力需要幫會眾人齊心建設，方可展現幫會神威，體力、內力、經驗、銀兩，四大加成缺一不可哦！ </p><p>【高清頭像，亮真容】 <br>還在為見不到女神的真面目而徹夜難眠嗎？還在為看不清小正太的面容而小小惋惜嗎？高清頭像展現，將最美好的形象亮給你！ </p><p>【守護女神，戰情敵】 <br>女神再現江湖，可是竟被不明人士追殺？是誰在行兇？趕快拿起武器，守護心目中的女神吧！只要女神脫困，還可獲得豐厚的獎勵哦！ </p><p>【搖錢寶樹，摘元寶】 <br>看清楚哦，寶樹上長的不是果子，那是一顆又一顆的大元寶哦！不過寶樹若要長成，還需眾多好友齊來灌溉，快快召集好友，一起來摘元寶吧！ </p><p>【桃李天下，收門徒】  <br>初涉江湖，沒有一個牛哄哄的師傅帶著，怎能確保安全！名滿天下，卻沒幾個得意弟子撐門面，怎好在武林同道面前顯擺！更何況還有極品加成和出師大禮包領取！弟子還會有額外的元寶作為謝禮先給師傅哦！</p><p>【任務，激戰BOSS，精英江湖，齊刷副本】  <br>幫會凝聚了一眾俠客的真氣，完成幫派任務可獲得豐厚獎勵。同心協力擊殺幫派BOSS可獲得更高價的獎勵哦，你~絕對不能錯過！ </p><p>【聚寶盆來襲，零風險】 <br>投資都有風險，但是咱們聚寶盆可謂是投資理財的奇葩，以零風險的姿態高壓一切。用少量元寶換去大量返利，絕對零風險，俠客們這可真是過了這個村沒這個店啊~，不來你就走寶了！ </p><p>【龍門鏢局，威震四海】 <br>行走江湖，不得不運鏢來掙些零花錢來用用。每天運鏢可獲得大量銀幣，您也可以化身山賊劫持鏢車，搶劫更多的銀幣！我也去劫鏢了，這麼好玩的怎可錯過！ </p><p>【幫會戰爭，佔領地盤】<br>大家期待已久的幫會戰來了哦，而且每天可以進行三次戰鬥，快快號召我們的小夥伴們出來戰鬥吧，把那些曾今欺負我們的江湖俠客紛紛拿下，佔領他們的地盤，獲得豐厚的獎勵哦！ </p><p>------------------------------ <br>聯繫我們 class="description">  邪惡勢力再次籠罩歌德卡斯的神聖大地， 面對你的命運，踏入無盡戰場追尋勝利與榮耀。 16 個巨大競技場正等著你大顯身手。 英雄，這是你征服的時刻！<p>RPG 動作遊戲代表作第三代載譽歸來，讓玩家再次免費體驗更精彩的傳奇！</p><p>免費體驗經典遊戲《地城獵人 3》<br>－ 體驗本遊戲著名的刺激戰鬥。 史詩般的即時打鬥，讓你每天樂趣無限！<br>－ 在 16 個競技場殺出血路，每個競技場難度分為四級，值得一玩再玩。<br>－ 隨時重訪任何競技場，刷新自我紀錄！ 或者每天接受挑戰，嘗試締造最佳紀錄，賺取更多精彩獎勵。</p><p>多種升級與進化選擇<br>－ 深入的角色自訂功能：戰神、占星師、騙徒或祭司，四種全新職業可供選擇，地城獵人更首次讓你自訂英雄的性別。<br>－ 冒險過程中解鎖 1,000 種以上的道具，若等不及也可直接購買。 你會成為最強大的英雄嗎？<br>－ 成功通過競技場所有關卡以獲取經驗值，升級時可解鎖新的技能與精靈攻擊。</p><p>前所未見的 HD 遊戲視覺效果<br>－ 造訪黑暗奇幻宇宙中的四個世界。 歌德卡斯玄機處處，讓您驚訝不斷！<br>－ 繪圖表現淋漓盡致，質感細膩、光影懾人、畫面更立體、動畫更流暢，創造驚豔 3D 遊戲體驗。<br>－ 動態殘影、擬真變形、動態顆粒等驚人視覺特效，讓您在火熱戰場施展炫目美技。</p><p>----</p><p>獻給角色扮演、免費動作遊戲和免費 Android 遊戲的遊戲迷</p><p>支援 Android 2.2、Android 2.3、Android 3.0、Android 3.1、Android 3.2、Android 4.0、Android Honeycomb 及 Android Ice 分鐘，操作容易內容有深度，適合愛動腦的你！<p>選擇一個英雄角色，深入地下城中打敗魔王，在遊戲中會出現各式各樣不同的事件，包括了不斷提昇等級的怪物，藏著寶物的門，販賣裝備的商人，提昇能力的精靈以及超強的魔王！你必需不斷的選擇優先解決那一個事件：</p><p>＊先打敗那一隻怪物？傷害少的？戰利品較好的？<br>＊打開那一扇門？金幣或裝備？其他的門會消失喔！<br>＊優先購買那一件裝備？巨劍？風之短刀？塔盾？<br>＊先提昇什麼能力？生命？攻擊？防禦？等待？</p><p>＝＝＝職業＝＝＝<br> * 菜鳥：快速昇級，能夠向其他英雄學習新技能。<br>＊野蠻人：強大的生命力，非常容易使用的角色。<br>＊狂戰士：強大的攻擊力，試著一擊必殺怪物吧。<br>＊重裝兵：攻防一體，考驗你的思考能力。<br>＊逃跑者：速度快防禦高，需要裝備的幫助。<br> * Make meaningful choices and carve your own path through this epic non-linear story. Test your strength with the dynamic turn-based combat system, prove your skill with the lock-picking minigame and accept the challenge of wits posed by the mysterious Shianti Cube!</p><p>The author Joe Dever has been working with the studio, involving himself in the story writing so it fits with the original continuity, while also shedding a new light on the fabled world of Magnamund.</p><p>For Sommerlund and the Kai!</p><p>FEATURES</p><p>- A brand-new adventure written by Joe Dever, now complete with all its four Acts!<br>- Create your character and try out different combinations of Kai Disciplines, traits and gear<br>- Write your own story through multiple choices<br>- A real combat system, where your prowess really counts –no random number table or dice to throw!<br>- 3 different difficulty levels to make the fighting experience more accessible -or more challenging!<br>- The new tactical pause system, that freezes time when you are choosing your next move. 》更壯闊的精彩冒險嗎？超懷舊『石器時代』、『魔力寶貝』的回合制戰鬥模式，最火熱的MMORPG手機線上遊戲《世界Online》繁中版本磅礡登場！<br>---------------------------------------------<br>中國超過600萬會員！締造超過5萬名會員同時在線記錄！ <br>百張大地圖，近百個有趣具深度的副本任務！搶先加入《世界Online》！ <br>e7Play邀你打造《世界Online》繁中版輝煌歷史！ <br>★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★</p><p>【遊戲世界觀】 <br>☆豐富副本任務☆ <br>以冒險、解迷為主要遊戲方式，引人入勝的劇情以及益智解謎風的個人、團體押標及無雙棋盤式任務，玩遊戲不用再無腦地追著任務跑。 </p><p>☆經典回合制戰鬥☆ <br>《世界Online》採用最經典的回合制，戰鬥更加刺激真實！快和朋友一起組隊向更高等的怪物挑戰！ </p><p>☆細膩紙娃娃系統☆ <br>《世界Online》中共超過500種的武器、道具及裝備。動漫COSPLAY秀讓你輕鬆化身火影忍者、聖鬥士星矢、死神等知名動漫人物！不費吹灰之力就能穿-<br>出個人特色，大方SHOW出你的風格！ </p><p>☆獨創城市系統☆ <br>你把城市發展成為繁榮的商業城市，或是成為世界的商業集中地，也可以發展成為軍事堡壘，都由你來決定！個人城市將伴隨你茁壯，也代表你一生的成就！ </p><p>☆霸氣國家系統☆ <br>擴建完自己的城市後還不知足？你還可以實現更壯大的霸業，建造自己的國家，邀請各地盟友加入！並向其他國家正式宣戰吧！ </p><p>☆超Q寵物系統☆ <br>《世界Online》中的各路英雄們不孤獨，眾多超Q的寵物陪你一起冒險，無論是萌女僕、神燈精靈、蒙面騎士通通任君挑選！快來培養技能滿點的寵物吧！ </p><p>☆俠義師徒系統☆ <br>在《世界Online》的新手沒煩惱，找個師父拜師學藝吧！只要師徒二人同時在線，經驗值加成讓就你等級大躍進！ </p><p>☆浪漫結婚系統☆ <br>邀請心愛的他／她在《世界Online》中共結連理！穿上華麗的禮服，共乘一台繽紛馬車，讓「全世界」見證你我永恆的愛情！ </p><p>☆BOSS副本定期更新☆ <br>攻城、屠龍、死亡騎士等各式主題副本每月定期更新，讓你體驗全新的任務，挑戰性滿點！快和好友組隊向傳說中的副本任務下戰帖！。 </p><p>☆多元交友功能☆ <br>想認識帥哥正妹？就看《世界Online》的照片人氣排行榜吧！。超特殊的暗戀功能，總是愛在心裡口難開？就使用暗戀功能，把你的心意偷偷告訴他，讓緣分悄悄-<br>靠近！ </p><p>☆便利聊天及郵件系統☆ <br>《世界Online》中不是只有砍怪練等！超完備的聊天系統，無論是和朋友聊天或送禮傳情都超便利，玩遊戲也能讓彼此感情再升溫！ </p><p>【職業介紹】 <br>☆西方種族 <br>法師－擁有強大的魔法傷害，掌握了各種元素力量 <br>戰士－西方種族，擁有強大的力量和體魄，精通各種重型武器 </p><p>☆東方種族 <br>修真－對道法了然於掌，善於運用五行之術輔助治療隊友以及傷害敵人。 Tiêu đề email : Vo lam 6d<br>2.	Nội dung email : Tên tài khoản trong game<br><br>================================<br>Võ Lâm Hùng Bá – Ngọa Long 3D được đánh giá là một trong những game nhập vai hành động đặc sắc nhất của năm 2015. Đáp ứng nhu cầu của nhân sĩ đam mê nghiệp kiếm khách vẫy vùng bốn bể. Bạn sẽ được hóa thân vào những nhân vật cổ trang như : Bắc Kiều Phong, Dương Quá, Lệnh Hồ Xung, hay các vị tiền bối uy lực danh trấn 4 cõi thiên hạ : Tây Độc Âu Dương Phong, Đông Tà Hoàng Dược Sư, Bắc Cái Hồng Thất Công, Nam Đế Đoàn trí hung. Thế giới Võ Lâm Truyền kỳ đón đợi bước chân hành hiệp của những con người trượng nghĩa khí khái với rất nhiều những công phu, đặc sắc. Bạn sẽ học các bí kíp võ lâm mật tịch để bôn tẩu giang hồ hành hiệp trượng nghĩa.<br>Hệ thông trang bị phong phú, đồ hoàng kim môn phái, vũ khí khảm nạm. tinh luyện rất quen thuộc. Hệ thống nhiệm vụ phụ bản đa dạng, nhiệm vụ hàng ngày, săn boss tổ đội cực nhiều tạo cho game thủ không bị cảm giác nhàm chán. Với cốt truyện dựa theo những bộ tiểu thuyết kiếm hiệp Kim Dung như : Thien long bát bộ, Phong vân, người chơi sẽ được quay lại khung cảnh những kinh thành như : Đại Lý, Thành Đô, Dương Châu. <br>Game cung cấp 6 môn phái và hệ thống ngũ hành tương sinh tương khắc rất thú vị như :<br>-	Nga my kiếm với kỹ năng : Phổ độ chúng sinh, Tam nga tế tuyết, Phong sương toái ảnh<br>-	Hoa sơn : kiếm ngạo giang hồ , Độc cô cửu kiếm, , đao kiếm vô song<br>-	Thiếu lâm tự với các chiêu thức : Dịch Cân Kinh ,Hàng long bát vũ, Như lai thiên điệp<br>-	Huyết đao với : Phi long tại thiên , Huyết đao ma pháp, , quỳ hoa bảo điển<br>-	Võ Đang của trương vô kỵ : Thiên địa vô cực, Nhân kiếm hợp nhất<br>-	Ngũ độc giáo : Sâu vô hình, huyền âm trảm, âm phong thực cốt.<br>Với đồ họa 3D hoành tráng, võ lâm mobile hy vọng sẽ làm hài lòng game thủ khó tính nhất, Hãy sống lại hồi ức võ lâm truyền kỳ, cùng các anh hung hào kiệt chứng tỏ bản lĩnh để xưng bá thiên hạ ngay thôi nào !!! <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a ÁC THẦN ONLINE  (AC THAN)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=MobiGames" title="MobiGames">MobiGames</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="at.mobo.vn"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaFAoSEhAKCmF0Lm1vYm8udm4QARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Ác thần Online là thể loại game thần hiệp MMOARPG đầu tiên do người Việt sáng tạo. Ác thần Online sẽ giúp bạn trải nghiệm 1 MMO thực thụ. Bạn sẽ tập luyện, chiến đấu cùng với bang hội của mình để trở thành những vị anh hùng trong thế giới của các vị thần. <br>Cùng trải qua hàng trăm thách thức trong những câu chuyện thần thoại và viết lên câu chuyện của riêng bạn! Ai sẽ giải cứu thế giới ra khỏi Ác Thần, ngoài bạn?<br>Ác thần Online - một game Việt đầy sức sáng tạo với chiến trận hoàng tráng dành cho bạn:<br>- Lựa chọn một trong 3 môn phái để xây dựng sự nghiệp của riêng mình<br>- Hệ thống Skill của nhân vật phong phú với nhiều lựa chọn <br>- Cho phép PK tự do<br>- Chiến trận cho phép sự tham gia của trên 100 anh hùng<br>- Cho phép chơi game ở tốc độ 3G thấp (Tốc độ 3G giới hạn)<br>- Hệ thống quà tặng cực kỳ phong phú và đa dạng<br>- Hệ thống UI dễ nhìn và dễ điều khiển.<br>Ác thần Online sẽ hỗ trợ:<br>- Android<br>+ Phiên bản 2.3 trở lên<br>+ Tương thích với hầu hết các dòng máy thông dụng tại thị trường Việt Nam hiện nay như SamSung, HTC, Sony, Huawei, LG, Kindle Fire, Google Nexus...<p>Ac Than là sản phẩm mới, tiêu biểu cho làng game Việt. Được sự đầu tư mạnh từ ME Corp, Ac Than được xem là một trong những game tiêu biểu cho năm 2015. Mọi thắc mắc về Ac Than xin liên hệ theo thông tin bên dưới. Hiện nay có rất nhiều game nhái theo Ac Than của ME Corp, xin mọi người chú ý cẩn thận. Ac Than, game của người Việt, cho người Việt.</p><p>TÌM HIỂU THÊM THÔNG TIN TẠI<br>- Trang chủ: http://acthan.vn/ - http://at.mobo.vn<br>- Fanpage: www.facebook.com/acthanonline<br>- Hỗ trợ: - 太初之章  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Auer+Media+%26+Entertainment" title="Auer Media &amp; data-server-cookie="CAIaIgogEh4KGGNvbS5hdWVyLnplbmdzaGVuLnpodHcwMhABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  奧爾資訊，繼『蒼神錄』系列後，又一MIT傾力大作！<p>原創故事穿稄中國歷史、神話，由封神到秦朝、三國到西遊記，隨著白翌（主角）以暢快淋漓的半自動戰鬥模式，一次過經歷多重滋味的書中世界。</p><p>遊戲特色：<br>●鑽研法陣創造隊伍獨特性，變化更豐富的戰鬥玩法！ <br>法陣書可以培養法陣師研發法陣的能力，以研發出更強大的新法陣，來讓上場的戰鬥夥伴的戰力與攻防交錯之間，更加具有戰略性與變化性！還有可能發現傳說中的絕世法陣，讓你的隊伍們更加所向披靡！ </p><p>●全新原創故事，找回單機遊戲時期，豐富劇情的最初感動！<br>採用小說式敘述法，以全新的故事巧妙連貫中國歷史的經典事件。隨著眾多劇情，可逐漸加入特色夥伴至團隊中，夥伴各自精采故事，與主線劇情環環相扣，交織出美妙動人的冒險樂章。</p><p>●眾多知名人物化身最強絕美魂卡，組合連攜招式，終極覺醒！<br>不只是三國，不只是西遊，還有更多你耳熟能詳的知名歷史人物角色。喚出這些古魂們封印成魂卡，並組合各魂卡之間的連攜招式，與角色一同戰鬥！還能以激靈珠將這些魂卡的能力提昇，甚至覺醒成終極最強狀態，華麗登場！</p><p>●3D即時巨大BOSS戰鬥震懾你的感官，集眾人之力群魔伏誅！<br>進行劇情時會不定時遇到元魔來襲，而每次擊倒之後，下一次元魔將會提昇強度。玩家可以選擇獨挑大樑，或是與朋友合力誅滅，甚至召援全伺服玩家一起挑戰。每次勝利後，每位參與者都可以獲得獎勵寶箱，傷害輸出最高者更可獲高階寶箱！</p><p>●神造功能不但讓武器裝備更強大，還有酷炫效果讓造型更閃！<br>裝備強化至頂以後，還可以用神造功能，讓裝備更強大。隨著神造階段的進化，產生不同的視覺效果，充分感受角色的成長變化。</p><p>●武英殿群雄競技，擊敗各路英雄豪傑，直衝九霄凌雲之巔！<br>想挑戰其他玩家的強度，武英殿是大展身手的對決場！裝上你最強大的武器防具，組合你最有利的魂卡連攜，擊敗眾多玩家，衝破九霄，榮登無極寶座！</p><p>立即加入社群參加好康活動！<br>《真神》官方粉絲團：https://www.facebook.com/zengshenOL<br>《真神》官方交流區：https://www.facebook.com/groups/zengshen</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> Soft Pixel Dungeon  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=wolispace" title="wolispace">wolispace</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.wolispace.softdpixeldungeon"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKQonEiUKH2NvbS53b2xpc3BhY2Uuc29mdGRwaXhlbGR1bmdlb24QARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  This is a small modification of Shattered Pixel Dungeon, which is an enhancement of the amazing game called Pixel Dungeon. games.</p><p>Soft Pixel Dungeon is not as hard:<br>- You can optionally load and save your games<br>- You can optionally make the game not so hard with useful stuff dropped in long grass and larger search radius.</p><p>If you choose not to use these options then the game is identical to Shattered Pixel Dungeon.</p><p>NOTE: When you die you have start start a new game, then go into settings while playing the game and load up a previous save.</p><p>There is no auto-save so you have to go into settings to save or load your current game.</p><p>Load and save games for each class individually (you   RPG Machine Knight  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=KEMCO_GAMES+(Kotobuki+Solution+Co.,+Ltd.)" title="KEMCO_GAMES (Kotobuki Solution Co., Ltd.)">KEMCO_GAMES (Kotobuki Solution Co., Ltd.)</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="kemco.hitpoint.machine"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmtlbWNvLmhpdHBvaW50Lm1hY2hpbmUQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  For the world, and for its sin, a young man meets betrayal and friendship beyond the “gate”!<br>An authentic free-to-play RPG!<p>* This game features some IAP content, such as powerful items and extra dungeons. While they require additional fees, you can play through the end of the game without it.</p><p>Story</p><p>Through the excesses of science, a “black sun” was created, leading to energy shortages. The world faced a certain doom.<br> After tremendous effort, scientists discovered a chance to save their world by acquiring an unknown energy source in another world beyond the “gate."<br>The mission to research the new world fell to a young scientist named Frain, in Schutzheim. He threw his body into the “gate” alone.<br>The other world was filled with nature and mystery, things he had never seen.<br>But what really awaited him was treachery and betrayal, by his own world.<br>People were trampled by machine soldiers, chasers were everywhere, and monsters stood in every avenue of escape…<br>Despite these hardships, though, he found new companions who trusted and supported him.<br>Another-world adventure fantasy RPG on an overwhelming scale!</p><p>Adventure and deception, stretching into another world!</p><p>For the sake of his world, a young man named Frain traveled to another. However he was betrayed by his own people.<br>Threatened by his own world, oppressed in the new world where he was trapped, lonely and hurt. But two heroines reached out their hands to this young man, and the story went on.<br>What’s is the truth behind the betrayal? Can Frain return to his world? What will happen between Frain and the two heroines?<br>The adventure of betrayal and friendship will start, with great feeling and deception.</p><p>Dot art work in a warm atmosphere</p><p>Dot art work in expressive characters and monsters give the game a warm atmosphere.<br>Another world beyond the “gate” is colored with dot art work.</p><p>A challenging game system</p><p>This game system is filled with challenging elements, including the “Machina Board” system through which you can learn various jobs and skills, creating weapons by collecting materials, playing various sub quests, and challenging extra dungeons, as well as the main story!</p><p>Who will you choose between the two heroines?</p><p>Bell and Aulin are the two heroines who reach out their hands to the young man Frain.<br>The generous sister Bell and the cheerful, spirited Aulin.<br>During the adventure, these two heroines show their different personalities.<br>Which one will you choose?</p><p>[EULA]<br>Your use of the application constitutes your acceptance of the following EULA:<br>http://kemco.jp/eula/eula_EN.html</p><p>[Supported OS Versions]<br>- 2.1, 2.2, 2.3, 3.1, 3.2, 4.0, 4.1, 4.2, 4.3, 4.4, 5.0<br>[Supported Screens]<br>- HVGA (320x480) and above<br>[Xperia(TM) PLAY]<br>- Xperia PLAY Optimized<br>[SD Card Storage]<br>- Enabled<br>[Supported Languages]<br>- Japanese, English<br>[Non-Supported Devices]<br>- HT-03A(OS1.6), LYNX(OS1.6), IS01(OS1.6), 003Z(OS2.2)<br>(This app has generally been tested to work on almost all mobile device distributed in Japan. Eyes of Dragon  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=OGAME" title="OGAME">OGAME</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.fysco.de"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaFgoUEhIKDGNvbS5meXNjby5kZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  “Eyes of Dragon” –  это масштабная ролевая игра, которая открывает перед вами богатый фэнтезийный мир.<br>В этом беззаконном мире игры вы столкнетесь с настоящими ужасами и устрашающими демонами, яростными и захватывающими сражениями с сильнейшими бойцами и их невообразимым мастерством!<br>Вступив в игру, вы сразу окунетесь в интересный игровой сюжет, который зацепит вас надолго. Выберите себе героя, подходящего именно для вас, и прокачайте его до высшего уровня и вместе вы добьетесь большого величества и наград!<br>Помимо интересного сюжета, вас ждут мощные образы, удивительные звуковые эффекты, которые не оставят равнодушным ни одного игрока! In this episode of Doctor X, the city’s most important heroes-- firemen, policemen, postman, and superheroes-- need your medical attention! No need to do the math. Just configure the heat sinks used on your portal in the timer configuration, and it does the math for you.</p><p>Your portal has multi hack? Just configure the multi hacks used on your portal in the counter configuration.</p><p>Need different timer/counter configurations? You can configure all the timers/counters you want, and show/hide them when you want.</p><p>Need to move timers/counters? Just swipe left or right, and they will change position. You can configure the 3 default positions the way you want.</p><p>Need to hide timers/counters? Swipe them up or down.</p><p>Timers and counters have never been so simple and easy to use.</p><p>Integrated Timer for Ingress is NOT affiliated in any way with Google Inc. and Ingress.<br>Integrated Timer do not hack or interfere in any way with Ingress game normal behavior and is not intended to do so.<br>Ingress name and logo, and Resistance and Enlightened logos are the property of Google Inc.<br>Based on our understanding of Ingress Term of Service, Integrated Timer may be considered as a fair use, and do not violate the Term of Service. ***<p>該手術的醫生又回來了，但這次一些漂亮的媽媽們期待！ YES！還有一些孕婦媽媽們在醫院等待分娩醫生的注意。伸出援助之手，以婦產科醫生，學習最有效的方法是如何懷孕的媽媽生下。</p><p>媽媽的新生兒外科醫生是一個有趣的冒險除了手術醫生的俱樂部，讓孩子們可以享受和學習為好。手術的遊戲提供了所有的樂趣，但不偏出分享莫名的感覺對她的新生嬰兒的母親的愛。</p><p>拿起醫生的情況下，加入了生育的醫生在他們探險的醫院。看看媽媽生了一個小妹妹，哥哥甚至嬰兒雙胞胎。飼料洗澡和打扮的可愛的新生嬰兒或嬰兒雙胞胎，沒有什麼可以與具有新的小妹妹或嬰兒雙胞胎破壞和疼惜的喜悅。手術遊戲每個活動是一個機會，了解更多的新生嬰兒以及有關生育的醫生。</p><p>讓您的孩子在學習有史以來最快樂的方式：</p><p>•輕鬆點擊並拖動新生嬰兒遊戲<br>•幫助產婦的醫生在醫院裡。<br>•小心懷孕時媽媽生下。<br>•享受孕遊戲的偉大情懷。<br>•將新生嬰兒的姐姐，小弟弟或嬰兒雙胞胎的照顧。<br>•手術兒童遊戲具有極高兒童友好的內容。</p><p>玩生育醫生的作用，使新的嬰兒或嬰兒雙胞胎高興。媽媽的新生兒外科醫生是一個有趣的遊戲手術為孩子們尋找媽媽在醫院之後。</p><p>想了解更多？更多的即將到來，只要按照鏈接查看更多手術遊戲：</p><p>https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=Mr+Plum</p><p>也加入我們的Facebook上婦產醫生Adventures更新：<br>https://www.facebook.com/mrplumgames</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> square-cover apps small"> <div class="card-content id-track-click id-track-impression" data-docid="com.dit599.customPD" data-server-cookie="CAIaHQobEhkKE2NvbS5kaXQ1OTkuY3VzdG9tUEQQARgD" data-uitype="500">  <a class="card-click-target" data-server-cookie="CAIaHQobEhkKE2NvbS5kaXQ1OTkuY3VzdG9tUEQQARgD" data-uitype="500" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.dit599.customPD" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a> <div class="cover"> <div class="cover-image-container"> <div class="cover-outer-align"> <div class="cover-inner-align"> <img alt="Your Pixel Dungeon" class="cover-image" data-cover-large="https://lh4.ggpht.com/YIqtJw_PRGg9Cg2PEQhlzen9WCcobuV_9BwIpXUyJQiW4bM69iUo7sJNlhEHQEET04Q=w340-rw" data-cover-small="https://lh4.ggpht.com/YIqtJw_PRGg9Cg2PEQhlzen9WCcobuV_9BwIpXUyJQiW4bM69iUo7sJNlhEHQEET04Q=w170-rw" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.dit599.customPD" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.dit599.customPD" title="Your Pixel Dungeon"> 514.    Your Pixel Dungeon  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Eric+Britsman" title="Eric Britsman">Eric Britsman</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.dit599.customPD"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHQobEhkKE2NvbS5kaXQ1OTkuY3VzdG9tUEQQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  NOTE: This mod is currently not being updated due to other priorities.<p>Your Pixel Dungeon is a modification of the open source game Pixel Dungeon, which is a popular roguelike for the android platform. This mod currently adds a tutorial and a map editor feature. Maps can be exported to/imported from a public folder called YourPD. When connected to a computer you can copy the files in the folder to send to other people, and put other peoples' maps on your own phone (if you have downloaded any and placed on your phone).</p><p>see also: http://pixeldungeon.wikia.com/wiki/Thread:25535 &amp; http://www.reddit.com/r/PixelDungeon/comments/2sefhv/your_pixel_dungeon_v095_quickslots_key_rings/</p><p>License information can be found here: gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html</p><p>Our source code can be found here: https://github.com/QuattroX/pixel-dungeon</p><p>The original game can be found here: play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.watabou.pixeldungeon<br>The original source code can be found here: https://github.com/watabou/pixel-dungeon</p><p>Please feel free to leave a review, any feedback is much appreciated!</p><p>If you feel like helping us even further, you could answer this short survey about the tutorial: https://www.murvey.com/s?546bc65a9c3e57c94a000130</p><p>GENERAL TIPS<br>The game uses autosave (so don't worry about how to save manually). The save for a character is deleted if the character dies.</p><p>MAP EDITOR TIPS<br>You can scroll up/down in the map editor views.</p><p>You can have max 10 custom dungeons (with any amount of depths). Longclick on a file in the first page of map editor to access the file delete dialog. </p><p>The tabs in the second page of the map editor are scrollable, you may need to scroll a bit to access and modify a certain depth. </p><p>If a floor tab is long-pressed, the tab (and that floor in the map) is deleted. Due to a bug if you delete floor 1 when only 2 floors are left and floor 1 is selected, you will need to go out of the tabs view and reselect the map you were editing (to force refresh ui).</p><p>You will automatically get a "finish" screen when descending the last staircase in your custom dungeon.</p><p>If you want the player to start at a certain level with certain items, the best solution right now is to have your first depth be mob-free, then add items and experience potions as needed to depth 1 then have the "real start" be from depth 2.</p><p>The game's wiki has information about all items, mobs, rooms etc : pixeldungeon.wikia.com/wiki/Main_Page </p><p>MAP EDITOR LIMITATIONS<br>Depths are generated based on the custom settings, but the layout of each depth will always be random (you will find everything you have specified, but it will be in a different place on the depth each time).</p><p>Boss type depths can only be modified with items (and always contain the "correct" boss).</p><p>Rooms can currently not be modified. As such, Shop room is not selectable since the items in it is based on "standard" 25 floor dungeon logic.</p><p>Sign contents/placement is not currently supported.</p><p>Quests are not currently supported.</p><p>Cannot set starting level/equipment of the player character.</p><p>//YourPD YoYo 甜圈早餐：兒童甜圈製作大師  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Candyoyo" title="Candyoyo">Candyoyo</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="air.com.candyoyo.YoYoDonutsBreakfast"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLgosEioKJGFpci5jb20uY2FuZHlveW8uWW9Zb0RvbnV0c0JyZWFrZmFzdBABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  根據客人的口味要求，首先把麵團放在相應的模具裡，這裡有常規形狀，可愛的kitty貓形狀，花朵形狀等。炸甜圈時注意控制好時間，炸至金黃後，撒上客戶想要的果醬或糖霜，果醬有好多，如巧克力，草莓，檸檬，橘子，抹茶等。各種顏色的細條顆粒狀的糖霜，燕麥片等，還有口味多多的果汁哦！橙汁，蘋果汁，草莓汁，西瓜汁，鳳梨汁，應有盡有。然後就是客人們的享用時間了。還在等什麼？ ！甜圈大師們，讓我們一起開啟甜圈製作之旅吧！<br>特點：<br>1.獨一無二的甜圈製作體驗。<br>2.各種各樣的模具，繁多的果醬，糖霜，可以製作不同形狀，不同口味的甜圈。多種果味果汁。營造健康早餐氛圍。<br>3.適用於5-15歲兒童。遊戲簡單，有趣，寓教於樂。讓孩子們在輕鬆快樂的遊戲中熟悉甜圈的製作流程。<br>4.遊戲場景生動形象。<br>5.這是一款免費的兒童模擬遊戲，歡迎購買更多的道具，讓孩子在玩中學習，更精彩。<p>您可以通過以下方式找到我們：<br>請訪問我們的網站：http://www.candyoyo.com/<br>Google+: https://plus.google.com/+Candyoyo<br>加入我們的Facebook大家族吧：https://www.facebook.com/pages/Candyoyo/1540987956180255<br>動感可愛的視頻盡在：http://www.youtube.com/c/Candyoyo&nbsp;</p><p>聯繫我們<br>請告訴我們您的想法！有任何疑問、建議或需要技術支持？每週7天24小時都可以通過candyoyo7788@gmail.com class="description">  在遊戲過程中如有任何疑問，可以通過官方客服信箱與我們聯繫：<br>《逆轉英雄》官方網頁　http://rh.uj.com.tw<br>《逆轉英雄》官方粉絲專頁　https://www.facebook.com/reverseheros<br>《逆轉英雄》客服信箱：lok@uj.com.tw<p><br>●操作簡單，5分鐘保證上手●<br>●精彩的冒險故事，當個救世主奮鬥吧●<br>●可愛寵物超多，自由選擇寵物外型●<br>●線上獎勵超豐富，每天都有虛寶領●<br>●英雄排排站，巧妙擺陣贏得勝利●<br>●日本大人氣RPG網遊改編●</p><p><br>宇峻奧汀代理，日本超人氣網頁遊戲改編。</p><p>【遊戲簡介】 <br>《逆轉英雄》是一款魔幻色彩的「RPG角色培育」遊戲。玩家將扮演一位新生的勇者，幫助各個城鎮的居民打擊魔物。<br>遊戲中玩家可自由招募各種不同的英雄伴隨前往冒險，併使用巧妙的陣型，變化各種不同的英雄站位來贏得戰鬥。遊戲中還有多種可愛的魔寵可以隨同英雄出戰，在冒險的路上決定是必備良伴。<br>英雄的裝備無須更換，只需要藉由遊戲中就可以取得的道具和金幣讓裝備成長，簡單的英雄養成絕對是手機遊戲不可錯過的必玩作品。</p><p>◆多種陣型變化<br>《逆轉英雄》屬於回合制戰鬥，因此在戰鬥中最重要的就是陣型以及英雄的站位。共有8種陣型，每種陣型的英雄站位和先手位置都不同。當陣型達到指定等級時，會自動開放下一個陣型格，玩家就可以</p><p>在多上陣一名英雄了。每個陣型最多可以上陣5名英雄，因此決定要使用哪個陣型來進行戰鬥也增添許多挑戰性。<br>◆新奇有趣的魔寵<br>每個英雄皆可以攜帶一隻魔寵，培育魔寵是提升戰鬥實力其中一個關鍵，魔寵也都可以學習到各種技能，有攻擊系、有防禦系也有輔助系，不但帶在身邊拉風，還可以在戰鬥中幫助主人擊退敵人。<br>◆生動的冒險故事<br>《逆轉英雄》有完整的主線劇情及支線劇情交互鋪陳，進行遊戲的過程中，還可以充分融入卡米洛世界的奇幻旅程，故事精彩絕倫，越玩越有趣。<br>◆豐富的英雄培育系統<br>遊戲中除了主角之外，也會招募到各種強力的英雄加入，培育方法非常豐富多元，裝備提升、祈福強化、星牌卜卦、技能升級、魔石鑲嵌等，打造獨一無二的夢幻英雄隊伍。</p><p>在遊戲過程中如有任何疑問，可以通過官方客服信箱與我們聯繫：<br>《逆轉英雄》官方網站 href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.nanoconnect.childhunter" title="マタギの鍋"> 536.    マタギの鍋  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Nanoconnect.inc" title="Nanoconnect.inc">Nanoconnect.inc</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="jp.co.nanoconnect.childhunter"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy <div class="description">  その閃きが生死を分ける、全く新しいSRPG<br>前衛が獲物を牽制し、後衛が獲物を仕留める。<br>仲間同士を連携させて、困難な状況を打開していく<br>フォーメーション重視の戦略バトル！<p>投石・弓矢・猟銃、３つの武器を使い分けろ！<br>援護射撃を得意とする投石、<br>バランスのとれた武器である弓矢、<br>一撃は大きいが獲物に逃げられやすい猟銃。<br>３つの武器を使い分けて、最高の一手を生み出そう！</p><p>大興奮のハック＆スラッシュ<br>倒した獲物が持っている宝箱から<br>強力な武器やアクセサリーを入手して、<br>歴戦の「マタギ」達をパワーアップしていこう！</p><p>愛する娘の為、最高の鍋作りを<br>君は、肉鍋を名物とする小さな村で、猟師団の団長を務めている。<br>ある日、村で流行り病が起こり、次々と倒れる村人たち。<br>病に倒れた愛娘の為、君は最高の鍋を作ろうと決意する。<br>最高の鍋に必要な材料は、伝承の生き物である「幻獣」の肉。<br>樹海や熱砂、雪山といった厳しい大自然に身を投じ、<br>幻獣を探し出して仕留める事が、君に課せられた使命だ。</p><p>----------------------------------------<br>迷える、未来のマタギ達へ<br>----------------------------------------<br>元気に原っぱを駆ける罪なき野ウサギを、その手にかける時、<br>ひょっとしたら、君は心を痛めるかもしれない。<br>或いは、生きていく為の仕方ない犠牲と割り切るのかもしれない。<br>その迷いは人の心、その後悔もまた人の心。<br>銃口の見据える先には善も悪もなく、ただ命に引導を渡し続ける。<br>人の心は次第に姿を変え、いずれ悪鬼へと変わり果てるかもしれない。</p><p>マタギの獲物は死神の鎌、マタギの道は修羅の道――</p><p>君に、死神となる覚悟はあるか。君に、修羅と化す強さはあるか。<br>その答えを求めるならば、この戦場に身を投じてみて欲しい。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p>
